description.content: Farming keeps the world alive by sustaining food, ecosystems, and communities. At Oktarkari, we practice agriculture with respect for nature, ensuring healthy produce while preserving environmental balance. Every seed and every harvest supports livelihoods, biodiversity, and a shared future. Farming is not just our work—it is our responsibility to the planet and to generations ahead.

caption.content: From the smallest seed comes food, life, and civilization...

description.content:
For a long time, we believed food was just food. Something to eat. Something to fill our plates.

But slowly, we began to see another truth. More illness. More long-term diseases. More questions about what truly nourishes us. We realized that what we eat shapes who we are.


Oktarkari was born to return to nature—to grow food the way the earth intended, in balance with soil, water, seasons, and the natural rhythm of the universe. Organic farming became our foundation because it respects life.


This is more than food. It’s a responsibility.

Oktarkari is a journey back to nature—for ourselves, and for generations to come.

description.content:
We open our farm to people who want to experience farming as life and lifestyle.Here, you can walk through fields that feel like a forest, touch the soil, plant seeds, harvest crops, and understand where real food comes from.
 
Our farm sits close to the city, yet feels worlds away — surrounded by greenery, birds, and the calm rhythm of nature. It’s a place to slow down, breathe, and reconnect.

description.content:
Modern food is fast, distant, and disconnected.We rarely know who grew it, how it was grown, or what it does to our bodies and the earth.At Oktarkari, we believe food should heal — not harm.
Farming should restore — not exploit.

caption.content: Let Us Tell You Our Story

description.content:
Suraj Rupacha
Managing Director
Aaroohee Technology Pvt. Ltd.

caption.content:
Ever since Stellar Education was founded in 2011, I have observed its advancement as a 
superlative counseling organization in Nepal. It serves the swiftly and spectacularly 
changing needs of innovative students from the region. We rest on the principled 
foundation as laid out in our mission while fashioning a new future with our students and 
our constituents. 
So as we move towards the third decade, let's work together to aim strategies for the 
challenges. Let's find new ways to reach students aiming at liberal and accessible higher 
education that leads to career opportunities worldwide. It has been 
friends now at University around the globe.
I look forward to the challenges and openings of the future!
